Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near 79th/South Shore Drive
ShortDescription: Southbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are rerouted via South Shore, 75th, Coles, 79th, and to terminal, due to street blockage near 79th/South Shore Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via South Shore, 75th, Coles, 79th, and to terminal, due to street blockage near 79th/South Shore Drive.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at Commercial/92nd
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temp rerouted in both directions via Commercial, 92nd, Houston, 91st and Commercial, near Commercial/92nd

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Commercial, 92nd, Houston, 91st and Commercial then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Commercial/92nd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #96 Lunt Temporary Reroute at Lunt/Rockwell
ShortDescription: #96 Lunt buses are temp rerouted in both directions via Lunt, Touhy, California, Pratt, Western and Lunt, due to fire department activity near Lunt/Rockwell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Lunt, Touhy, California, Pratt, Western and Lunt, then resume their normal route on Lunt, due to fire department activity near Lunt/Rockwell.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Grand
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Grand due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Grand due to police activity. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
